archiveTicketConfigNotFound: Archived Ticket Config does not exist!
selectTicketType: Please select the type of ticket you want to create:
welcomeMsg: Please wait for a staff member to assist you. Once the issue is resolved, you or a staff member can close the ticket with the button below. If you believe only Admins should view this ticket (due to confidentiality, etc.) you can use the Admin Only button below.

adminOnly.confirm: ⚠️ Are you sure you want to make this ticket Admin Only?
adminOnly.request: has requested to make this ticket Admin Only.

close.confirm: ⚠️ Are you sure you want to close this ticket?
close.byUser: User has initiated the ticket to close...

transcriptCreate.success: Transcript successfully sent to channel and deleted from memory!
transcriptCreate.attachmentFound: Attachment file found; adding to message.

transcriptDelete.error1: Error deleting the transcript txt file!
transcriptDelete.attachmentError: Error deleting transcript attachments zip file!

subcmdDescrp.option: Channel to send the message to
subcmdDescrp.catset: Category to set the global ticket category to

setup.createTicket: Need help? Press the button below to create a ticket!
setup.successSet: The setup message was sent in
setup.successUpdate: The setup channel was updated to

bapple.approve: Your appeal has been approved and you may rejoin the server at your convenience. Please make sure to review our /rules once you do. This ticket will be closed in 24 hours or upon acknowledgement.
bapple.deny: Your appeal was denied; Staff do not feel comfortable letting you back on the server at this time. You may re-appeal your ban in 6 months from now. In that time, please use it as an opportunity to grow and understand why your actions were unacceptable and necessitated the ban in the first place. This ticket will be closed in 24 hours or upon acknowledgement.
